name: Accounting and taxation
description: Under Business, Administration and Law / Business and administration, this field is the study of methods for maintaining, auditing, and recording financial transactions, as well as managing and preparing tax returns and strategies. [cite: 137, 138]

name: Accounting
description: The process of recording financial transactions pertaining to a business, a core component of Accounting and taxation. [cite: 138]

name: Auditing
description: The systematic examination of an organization's financial records to determine their accuracy and compliance with applicable standards and regulations, within Accounting and taxation. [cite: 138]

name: Bookkeeping
description: The recording of financial transactions, and is part of the process of accounting in business, studied in Accounting and taxation. [cite: 138]

name: Tax accounting
description: Accounting methods focused on taxes rather than the appearance of public financial statements, a specialization within Accounting and taxation. [cite: 138]

name: Tax management
description: The analysis of a financial situation or plan from a tax perspective, to ensure tax efficiency, part of Accounting and taxation. [cite: 138]
